tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I generally dont write reviews but it was a very good experience with this duo.

I had severe toothache but the reason was because of wisdom tooth. Doctor suggested to go for extraction.

Firstly when i spoke to Dr. Kavitha and she could sense that I am too scared for any extraction, she comforted me saying that I can just come, get the tooth checked and if i dont wish to continue i can leave it. But not to worry. That itself was too comforting. I decided to go there.

After going there, didn’t have to wait at all.

Dr. Srihari and Dr. Kavitha were have given time quickly. I explained to them that I am too scared of pricks or anything and i tend to faint.

Dr. Srihari has also again comforted me during the whole procedure. I was feeling uncomfortable after first injection and to that he was way too much patient with me.

When he removed the tooth, it took him literally 2-5 min but i think the team spent more than 15 min to make me calm in that place.

I may not have gone ahead if they were not this patient.

I know they have given their valuable time to me and gone extra mile to make me feel comfortable.

Dr. Kavitha has also personally been checking on me after the procedure on the conditions.

I would certainly recommend the duo.

Thanks a lot doctor.

You both are charming

tags: Doctor friendliness,

Awsome work and good hospitality  friendly behavior 
Really appreciate the work, i give 100% ratings

review: My case was a little complicated due to an old infectious tooth needed to be removed. Doctor calmed me down and explained about the process and was very receptive of my fear of pain of dental procedures. I had the extraction done yesterday with almost no pain during the process. Even today I feel ok without much discomfort.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Sri Hari for Wisdom tooth removal. He explained the teeth position, and treatment procedure patiently and gave us enough time to think and proceed. He is very friendly and assured that he will perform the extraction with minimal pain.  He enquired about all the past history, and gave enough confidence to proceed. 
After anesthesia is effective, it hardly took 5 min for the complete procedure.
Clearly explained the post-treatment measures and very effective.

I strongly recommend him for his expertise, and friendliness that makes the patient very comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from acute pain because of my wisdom tooth and it had to be removed from quite a long time. I had been postponing it.
 There were complications as suggested years before by my earlier doctor that the nerve would damaged and certainly the tooth beside it would get affected while extracting this. 
But today turned out to be perfect. The whole process took less than ten minutes and doctor Shrihari did it with such ease and expertise , that I was happy that I waited this long to get my wisdom tooth extracted.
The  tooth right beside it is fit and fine, no discomfort felt even after the effect of anastasia worned out.
I would highly recommend Dr.Shrihari to my friends and family. Anytime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Srihari & Dr. Kavitha we’re very friendly and they made me understand the surgery process very clearly. The whole surgery went very smooth and hassle free. Today is the second day of my surgery and I’ve a little pain but I’m feeling completely ok. I had undergone wisdom tooth removal surgery, it was not a easy one as it was growing horizontally and that too to the opposite side. The doctor had to break the tooth into 3 pieces which was a difficult task. The surgery was successful, the whole process took 30 minutes. 

Thanks to Dr. Srihari & Dr. Kavitha!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Srihari was very polite and humble. He explained the process patiently in my mom’s native language. She was very tensed About the procedure. He calmed her down patiently and assured her of speedy recovery. He also gave phone support for any problems after the procedure. Highly recommend this doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ******* ***** ** ** **** ******** The tooth extraction was done very cleanly, infact I didn't realise the tooth was out very soon.  He was explaining every step and was prompted on what to expect at all times.

However, I wonder why an old fashioned stitch was given and not one that dissolves on its own or usage of glue. Need to go back after a week to get the stitch removed, which was completely avoidable.
reply_text:
Mr. Vipin, thank you for your feedback.
Resorbable sutures takes weeks to dissolve, we have had cases of suture abscess with sutures and wound opening up prematurely in case of truglue. I think the option should be given to the patient. 
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Shri Hari is just great with patients . My whole tooth extraction process was carried by him smoothly . Half of my tooth was embedded inside so it took time . But the procedure went smoothly . He was constantly checking on me and was gentle no hurry at all . My friebds told me my lips, cheeks will swell badly for two days but I don't have any swelling , very little pain and totally comfortable. Thanks to him fir doing it so well .

tags: Wait time,
review: Dr. Shrihari V is a very efficient doctor. I contacted him for wisdom tooth removal. He explained the process in detail and the surgery was completed in very less time. I have recovered fully within a day. I am very satisfied with the treatment. I would definitely recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had 2 wisdom teeth extraction scheduled with the doctor. I have a very low threshold for pain because of which I was very scared before the procedure. I have had wisdom tooth extraction done before and it was a very painful experience. Doctor Srihari calmly explained the procedure and was extremely patient. He kept reassuring me throughout the procedure. My teeth were curved at the bottom so couldn’t be pulled out easily, a part had to be cut and then the entire tooth had to be twisted and pulled out. He made sure that I was only able to feel the pressure and absolutely no pain. He is a very skilled professional and is able to show great empathy for his patients. Very impressed and grateful, will definitely recommend to all my friends.
